The backslider bewailed, the careless warned: and the faithful encouraged. With true desires, and living breathings for the preservation of the whole Israel of God. / Written by P. Hendrick... ; translated into English by W.C. Hendricks, Pieter. Caton, William, 1636-1665.

s.n.], [London : Printed in the year 1665.
